shorts.title: Pet lovers unite at ‘Paws in the Park’ celebration in Scranton
shorts.title_distilled: Pet lovers unite at ‘Paws in the Park’ celebration in Scranton.
shorts.description: Visitors flocked to McDade Park in Scranton for a pet adoption event by Griffin Pond Animal Shelter featuring live entertainment and local vendors.
shorts.content: Visitors flocked to McDade Park in Scranton for a pet adoption event by Griffin Pond Animal Shelter featuring live entertainment and local vendors.

shorts.title: Fire in South Scranton leaves three firefighters hurt, around 20 displaced
shorts.title_distilled: Fire in South Scranton leaves three firefighters hurt, around 20 displaced.
shorts.description: Crews were called to a fire in South Scranton around 6 p.m. Sunday, which left a block charred, three firefighters hurt, and around 20 displaced.
shorts.content: Crews were called to a fire in South Scranton around 6 p.m. Sunday, which left a block charred, three firefighters hurt, and around 20 displaced.
